text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Umeoka played for Prima Ham FC Kunoichi. On June 15, 1997, Umeoka debuted for the Japan national team against China. She played at 1997 AFC Championship. She played 4 games for Japan until 1998. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1997 3 0 1998 1 0 Total 4 0 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Iga FC Kunoichi Mie players Category:1997 AFC Women's Championship players Category:1949 births Category:Japan international footballers
title: Yumi Umeoka
